mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(email, username, password, phone_number, social_type, user_type, created_at) VALUES(#{email}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phoneNumber}, #{socialType}, #{userType}, now())

SELECT count(*) FROM user WHERE phone_number = #{phoneNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO delete_user (id, email, username, password, phone_number, social_type, user_type, created_at, deleted_at, delete_scheduled_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{email}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phoneNumber}, #{socialType}, #{userType}, #{createdAt}, NOW(), DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR))
